readable.title: 3255017708_2b02bfcdcf
readable.content: A man in American flag shorts holds a white cube at the entrance of a marble building . A man in American flag shorts stands at the top of the stairs . A man in flag underwear standing on the steps with a book and black shoes on . A man wearing US flag boxer shorts is standing on a stairway . Person standing on step wearing American flag shorts and holding a box .
